itemText: Imagine that there exists a part deep within you that you could call the "hidden observer." This part of you knows every detail of all behaviour and thought processes that go on within you and is aware of the deepest intimate information about yourself. However, it cannot be asked to talk about this intimate information unless it is allowed by you to do so.

Five brief descriptions of prank experiences from the target's perspective (taken from the website fmylife.com) appear below. Please read each one and - from the perspective of your "hidden observer" - rate your reactions to it.
